channel.description: Recent content in sphinx on Daria's webpage

item.title: Documentation in Sphinx
item.description: Goal Set-up Sphinx as a documentation engine for the project. Instead of visually dense reStructuredText letâ€™s use Google docstring. Support for this function is provided by sphinx.ext.napoleon extension. At the end, substitute the standard theme by sphinx-rtd-theme. Install pre-requisites python3.8 -m pip install sphinx sphinxcontrib-napoleon sphinx-rtd-theme Set-up documentation cd projectdir mkdir docs cd docs sphinx-quickstart sphinx-quickstart asks for basics information about the project. Keep sources and build directories separate.
